item.description:
This is a vegetarian Indian restaurant that opened up in East Hartford a few years ago. It is not supposed to be anything fancy, but the food is supposed to be excellent.

Here's an article from a couple years back:

http://www.hartfordad...

It says it's closed on Tuesdays, but I called to check and they are definitely open.

Please RSVP so I know how many to expect! Hope to see you there!

For more information, see http://www.hartfordad...

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: A Taste of South Asia--Dinner at Woodland Restaurant in East Hartford
